CustomField.description: Check to see if the Opportunity is active. If the Investment vehicle is In marketing and the Probability is >=30% and is not Won.
CustomField.formula: IF( Investment_Vehicle_In_Marketing__c = True && IsWon = False && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Firm Decline")), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check to see if the Opportunity is active. If the Investment vehicle is In marketing and the Probability is >=30% and is not Won.
CustomField.label: Active Opportunity
